snippet: The Justice Department brought fresh charges against four former Blackwater Worldwide security contractors, resurrecting a case over a deadly 2007 shooting in Baghdad.
abstract: Justice Dept brings fresh charges against four former Blackwater Worldwide security contractors, resurrecting a case over a deadly 2007 shooting in Baghdad that inflamed anti-American sentiment in Iraq; four men are accused of opening fire on Sept 16, 2007, killing 17 civilians, including women and children.
lead_paragraph: The Justice Department brought fresh charges against four former Blackwater Worldwide security contractors, resurrecting a case over a deadly 2007 shooting in Baghdad.
